verses.verse: And <S%H3478>Israel<s%> <S%H3427>stayed<s%> in <S%H7851>Shittim,<s%> and the <S%H5971>people<s%> <S%H2490>began<s%> to <S%H2181>commit<s%> <S%H2181>prostitution<s%> with the <S%H1323>daughters<s%> of <S%H4124>Moab.<s%>

And they <S%H7121>called<s%> the <S%H5971>people<s%> to the <S%H2077>sacrifices<s%> of their <S%H430>gods:<s%> and the <S%H5971>people<s%> did <S%H398>eat,<s%> and <S%H7812>bowed<s%> <S%H7812>down<s%> to their <S%H430>gods.<s%>
And <S%H3478>Israel<s%> <S%H6775>joined<s%> himself to <S%H1187>Baalpeor:<s%> and the <S%H639>anger<s%> of the <S%H3068>LORD<s%> was <S%H2734>kindled<s%> against <S%H3478>Israel.<s%>

And the <S%H3068>LORD<s%> <S%H559>said<s%> to <S%H4872>Moses,<s%> <S%H3947>Take<s%> <S%H3605>all<s%> the <S%H7218>heads<s%> of the <S%H5971>people,<s%> and <S%H3363>hang<s%> them up before the <S%H3068>LORD<s%> <S%H5048>against<s%> the <S%H8121>sun,<s%> that the <S%H2740>fierce<s%> <S%H639>anger<s%> of the <S%H3068>LORD<s%> may be <S%H7725>turned<s%> away from <S%H3478>Israel.<s%>

And <S%H4872>Moses<s%> <S%H559>said<s%> to the <S%H8199>judges<s%> of <S%H3478>Israel,<s%> <S%H2026>Slay<s%> you <S%H376>every<s%> <S%H376>one<s%> his <S%H582>men<s%> that were <S%H6775>joined<s%> to <S%H1187>Baalpeor.<s%>

And, <S%H2009>behold,<s%> <S%H376>one<s%> of the <S%H1121>children<s%> of <S%H3478>Israel<s%> <S%H935>came<s%> and <S%H7126>brought<s%> to his <S%H251>brothers<s%> a <S%H4084>Midianitish<s%> woman in the <S%H5869>sight<s%> of <S%H4872>Moses,<s%> and in the <S%H5869>sight<s%> of <S%H3605>all<s%> the <S%H5712>congregation<s%> of the <S%H1121>children<s%> of <S%H3478>Israel,<s%> <S%H1992>who<s%> were <S%H1058>weeping<s%> before the <S%H6607>door<s%> of the <S%H168>tabernacle<s%> of the <S%H4150>congregation.<s%>

And when <S%H6372>Phinehas,<s%> the <S%H1121>son<s%> of <S%H499>Eleazar,<s%> the <S%H1121>son<s%> of <S%H175>Aaron<s%> the <S%H3548>priest,<s%> <S%H7200>saw<s%> it, he <S%H6965>rose<s%> up from <S%H8432>among<s%> the <S%H5712>congregation,<s%> and <S%H3947>took<s%> a <S%H7420>javelin<s%> in his <S%H3027>hand;<s%>

And he <S%H935>went<s%> <S%H310>after<s%> the <S%H376>man<s%> of <S%H3478>Israel<s%> <S%H413>into<s%> the <S%H6898>tent,<s%> and <S%H1856>thrust<s%> <S%H8147>both<s%> of them through, the <S%H376>man<s%> of <S%H3478>Israel,<s%> and the <S%H802>woman<s%> <S%H413>through<s%> her <S%H6897>belly.<s%> So the <S%H4046>plague<s%> was <S%H6113>stayed<s%> from the <S%H1121>children<s%> of <S%H3478>Israel.<s%>
And those that <S%H4191>died<s%> in the <S%H4046>plague<s%> were <S%H6242>twenty<s%> and <S%H702>four<s%> <S%H505>thousand.<s%>

<S%H6372>Phinehas,<s%> the <S%H1121>son<s%> of <S%H499>Eleazar,<s%> the <S%H1121>son<s%> of <S%H175>Aaron<s%> the <S%H3548>priest,<s%> has <S%H7725>turned<s%> my <S%H2534>wrath<s%> away from the <S%H1121>children<s%> of <S%H3478>Israel,<s%> while he was <S%H7065>zealous<s%> for my <S%H7068>sake<s%> <S%H8432>among<s%> them, that I <S%H3615>consumed<s%> not the <S%H1121>children<s%> of <S%H3478>Israel<s%> in my <S%H7068>jealousy.<s%>

And he shall <S%H1961>have<s%> it, and his <S%H2233>seed<s%> <S%H310>after<s%> him, even the <S%H1285>covenant<s%> of an <S%H5769>everlasting<s%> <S%H3550>priesthood;<s%> <S%H8478>because<s%> <S%H834><s%> he was <S%H7065>zealous<s%> for his <S%H430>God,<s%> and made an <S%H3722>atonement<s%> for the <S%H1121>children<s%> of <S%H3478>Israel.<s%>

Now the <S%H8034>name<s%> of the <S%H1121>Israelite<s%> <S%H3478><s%> that was <S%H5221>slain,<s%> even that was <S%H5221>slain<s%> with the <S%H4084>Midianitish<s%> woman, was <S%H2174>Zimri,<s%> the <S%H1121>son<s%> of <S%H5543>Salu,<s%> a <S%H5387>prince<s%> of a <S%H1>chief<s%> <S%H1004>house<s%> among the <S%H8099>Simeonites.<s%>

And the <S%H8034>name<s%> of the <S%H4084>Midianitish<s%> <S%H802>woman<s%> that was <S%H5221>slain<s%> was <S%H3579>Cozbi,<s%> the <S%H1323>daughter<s%> of <S%H6698>Zur;<s%> he was <S%H7218>head<s%> over a <S%H523>people,<s%> and of a <S%H1>chief<s%> <S%H1004>house<s%> in <S%H4080>Midian.<s%>

For they <S%H6887>vex<s%> you with their <S%H5231>wiles,<s%> with <S%H834>which<s%> they have <S%H5230>beguiled<s%> you in the <S%H1697>matter<s%> of <S%H6465>Peor,<s%> and in the <S%H1697>matter<s%> of <S%H3579>Cozbi,<s%> the <S%H1323>daughter<s%> of a <S%H5387>prince<s%> of <S%H4080>Midian,<s%> their <S%H269>sister,<s%> which was <S%H5221>slain<s%> in the <S%H3117>day<s%> of the <S%H4046>plague<s%> for <S%H6465>Peor's<s%> <S%H1697>sake.<s%>
